instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2366: What is 820-2366? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2366</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> white screen
threads.message:
I received a Mac mini 2009 that chime but It only show white screen. Plug in an external hdd I can see that I neither try read the hdd or load the os, it's like it stucks after chime, even if I press ALT nothing show on screen.
I tried to change ram, installed another bios, changed lcd cable. 
When the customer bought it to me it didn't load OS, neither with another hard drive. I wasn't possible to select hard drive boot by pressing ALT, it could only boot with internal hdd.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2366</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> white screen
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2366</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> white screen
threads.message: The only option here is the BIOS, if that does not fix it I have no idea. Make sure to use PC8500 RAM only. Can it do a PRAM reset?
